roleset.name: to stop, slow up or control

example.name: transitive
example.text: If he were able [*-1] to construct a popular and efficient corporatist system , he or his heir would be wellplaced [*] to rein in political opposition , and to re-establish control in Eastern Europe .

roleset.note: REIN_IN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rein' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rein.01-v predicate notes)
